oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Parkway Towers, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1968
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Parkway Towers, a high-rise office building located at 404 James Robertson Parkway, in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1968. Construction of the building was completed in 1968, the building height 261 ft. with 21 floors above ground. There is a Commerce Union Bank sign in front of the building. The structure was designed in a modernist style. Forms part of Record Group 3. The original is a 35 mm color transparency (2 x 2 in. slide mount).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Parkway Towers (Nashville, Tenn.); Commerce Union Bank (Nashville, Tenn.)--History--Sources
